## Source: ossf-package-analysis (9a9a3e53f5018108f5ce8abbccd7313ccac30e61c7985e5d7d90291c30299957)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'rsi-configuration-module' @ 1.1.2 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
